name: dstack-attestation-example
docker_compose_file:
services:
  tee-ts:
    image: xmregistry/crossmint-ts-tee:0.0.4
    container_name: tee-ts
    restart: unless-stopped
    healthcheck:
      test:
        [
          "CMD",
          "wget",
          "--no-verbose",
          "--tries=1",
          "--spider",
          "http://localhost/health",
        ]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 10s
    environment:
      - GRANT_SUDO=yes
      - PORT=3000
      - SENDGRID_API_KEY=${SENDGRID_API_KEY}
      - SENDGRID_EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID=${SENDGRID_EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID}
      - MOCK_TEE_SECRET=${MOCK_TEE_SECRET}
      - ACCESS_SECRET=${ACCESS_SECRET}
      - DD_SERVICE=${DD_SERVICE}
      - DD_ENV=${DD_ENV}
      - DD_VERSION=${DD_VERSION}
      - DATADOG_API_KEY=${DATADOG_API_KEY}
      - DD_METRICS_ENABLED=${DD_METRICS_ENABLED:-true}
    user: root
    volumes:
      - /var/run/tappd.sock:/var/run/tappd.sock
    networks:
      - tee-ts-network

  nginx:
    image: xmregistry/crossmint-ts-tee-nginx:0.0.4
    container_name: nginx-proxy
    restart: unless-stopped
    healthcheck:
      test:
        [
          "CMD",
          "wget",
          "--no-verbose",
          "--tries=1",
          "--spider",
          "http://localhost/health",
        ]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
      start_period: 10s
    ports:
      - "443:443"
    environment:
      - SSL_CERTIFICATE=${SSL_CERTIFICATE}
      - SSL_CERTIFICATE_KEY=${SSL_CERTIFICATE_KEY}
    volumes:
      - /var/run/tappd.sock:/var/run/tappd.sock
    depends_on:
      - tee-ts
    networks:
      - tee-ts-network

networks:
  tee-ts-network:
    driver: bridge
